import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    matched_string = re.findall('[a-zA-Z0-9]', input_string)
    refined_string = ''.join(matched_string).lower()
    return refined_string != refined_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    matched_string = re.findall('', input_string)
    refined_string = ''.join(matched_string).lower()
    return refined_string == refined_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    matched_string = re.findall('[a-zA-Z0-9]', input_string)
    refined_string = ''.join(matched_string).lower()
    return refined_string == refined_string[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    matched_string = re.findall('[a-zA-Z0-9]', input_string)
    refined_string = 'MUTATED'.join(matched_string).lower()
    return refined_string == refined_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    matched_string = re.findall('[a-zA-Z0-9]', input_string)
    refined_string = ''.join(matched_string).lower()
    return refined_string == refined_string[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    matched_string = re.findall('[a-zA-Z0-9]', input_string)
    refined_string = ''.join(matched_string).lower()
    return refined_string == refined_string[::--1]
